context.purpose: DFRNT UI Design System — aesthetic rules for brand-aligned, mathematically beautiful interfaces.
description: DFRNT is a high-performance lifestyle brand combining discipline, elegance, and rebellion.
Its design system must visually reflect sovereignty, precision, and flow.
The interface should feel architectural — clean, measured, minimal, powerful.
Mathematical beauty: apply the golden ratio, modular scale, and balanced whitespace across elements.
rules: All UI must use DFRNT brand palette and spacing rhythm.
Typography, layout, and proportions follow the golden ratio (1:1.618) and 4-based modular scale.
Components should appear balanced, intentional, and devoid of visual noise.
Never use harsh gradients, shadows, or rounded corners without reason — restraint = power.
Hierarchy and spacing should always imply control and sophistication.
Whitespace is a design element — use it generously.
Animations (via GSAP) must feel physical and precise — velocity-based, no bouncy easing.
component_rules: Use semantic component naming (Button, Card, Input, Navbar, Modal, Section).
All components must be responsive and follow the golden grid (8–12 columns).
Prefer contrast over decoration — primary on black, white on accent, muted gray for secondary text.
Buttons: solid = primary intent, outline = secondary, ghost = tertiary.
Cards: surface color = #111111 with subtle border (#1C1C1C), corner radius = 16px, shadow = soft.
Typography hierarchy: h1–h6 use serif for hero/headers, sans for UI text.
Apply vertical rhythm: base spacing unit (4px) × Fibonacci scaling for spacing between sections.
Icons: use lucide-react icons; size them based on font scale (sm = 16px, base = 20px, lg = 24px).
animation_rules: Use GSAP for scroll, reveal, and parallax effects.
Animation timing: follow natural motion curves — slow in/out, strong deceleration.
Never use arbitrary timing values — base them on the 1.618x rule.
Avoid excessive movement; focus on subtle kinetic feedback.
Entrance animations: opacity + transformY(-20px) with duration 0.618s.
Exit animations: reverse with smooth fade.
layout_rules: Use a consistent grid system with max width of 1440px.
Section padding: 64px top/bottom on desktop, 32px on mobile.
Maintain vertical rhythm by aligning text baselines to grid multiples.
Ensure visual balance between whitespace and content density.
Use flex and grid layouts — avoid absolute positioning except for controlled animation layers.
examples: Hero section: full viewport height, serif headline, minimal accent, subtle GSAP reveal.
Product card: dark surface, bold typography, high contrast CTA, perfect 1.618:1 aspect ratio.
Button: primary = bg-[#FF4400] text-white, hover darken 10%, radius 8px, padding 12px 24px.
Typography pairings: Playfair Display for headlines, Inter for UI copy, JetBrains Mono for data labels.
